document.full_text: the willie l. brown jr. college preparatory academy, a part of the san francisco public schools system, opened to high hopes 18 years ago, but it has not been a success and will be closed in may.
document.title: willie brown academy, born in 1992 with high hopes, will close in may, a failure
lines_and_colors: the willie l. brown jr. college preparatory academy, a part of the san francisco public schools system, opened to high hopes 18 years ago, but it has not been a success and will be closed in may.
